entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who said 'You fell oﬀ,' indicating he was present at the scene and witnessed Harry's fall.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is mentioned as the one who was shaking, indicating she was emotionally affected by Harry's fall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione made a small, squeaky noise and her eyes were extremely bloodshot, indicating she was also emotionally affected by Harry's fall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who fell oﬀ and is the center of the conversation.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is mentioned as the one who caught the Snitch, which led to his team's win.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who told Harry that Diggory got the Snitch and they won fair and square.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as someone who admits that the opposing team won fair and square.

relationships.description: Diggory caught the Snitch, which led to his team's win and Harry's loss.
George informed Harry that Diggory got the Snitch and they won fair and square.
